pages.title: Hammer Time
pages.text: Most of the alloys in this mod can only be obtained through raw materials. But what if you have already smelted those into ingots? Well, I'm not gonna present you a way to use the ingots (yet), but I can show you how to get those raw materials back.
Behold... a hammer! If an ingot has a raw material counterpart, this tool will allow you (through crafting) to crush it. Might be useful, might be not. But if you need it, it's here.
